/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings that dot the background. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
